name: thematic-analysis-usercue
description: LangGraph-powered thematic analysis pipeline for qualitative research

scripts.test: npm run test:config && npm run test:basic && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:production && npm run test:performance
scripts.validate:env: npm run validate && node -e 'console.log("Environment validation:", process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY ? "✅ OPENAI_API_KEY set" : "❌ OPENAI_API_KEY missing")'
scripts.lint: node -e 'console.log("🔍 Linting project files..."); import("./src/main.js").then(() => console.log("✅ No syntax errors found")).catch(e => { console.error("❌ Syntax errors:", e.message); process.exit(1); })'
scripts.health-check: npm run validate:env && npm run lint && echo '✅ System health check passed'
scripts.deploy-check: npm run health-check && npm run test:production && echo '🚀 System ready for deployment'

author: Research Team
